resources:
Android Challenge No.5 CH.3
//// Buttons ///////////////////
PREV NEXT Yes No
/// Questions /////////////
Do you believe in ghosts? Have you ever seen a UFO? Can cats jump six times their length? Do you like chocolate milkshakes? Were you in the swamp yesterday? Can you see the moon?
Did baseball influence your life? Can a quarterback get a scholarship? Do you know any baseball players names? Have you ever been a golf caddy? Is ESPN the channel to watch live National Football League (NFL)? Can you do the four main swimming strokes?
Is there a rulebook for playing Tiddlywinks? Was Snakes and Ladders first played in China? Is Q worth 10 points in Scrabble? Are there 27 properties in Monopoly? Are there 12 tiles for the letter E in Scrabble? Can five people play Candyland?
